positiveComment: rooms were nice and clean. house keeping staff were very good. the gardeners did a wonderful job with the gardens keeping them well maintained. enjoyed out free on arrive spa. the staff attended to our request quickly.
negativeComment: when we arrived in our taxi we had to unload our own bags as the staff stood around and watched. this did not leave a very good first impression.

positiveComment: The courteous friendliness of the staff, quality of the food and the Arabic architecture all help to make this complex very special.  I try to make the time to visit each time that I am in Dubai
